battery-life_ipod_nano_8gb: Battery life seems to be good .

room_holiday_inn_london: Other than that, our stay was uneventful and the room was clean, if a bit small .

location_holiday_inn_london: The location of the hotel is excellent .

size_asus_netbook_1005ha: keyboard is actually a pleasure to use inspite of small size

Other than that, it is an amazing little computer and I can't see any reason to own a full sized laptop anymore .
screen_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: The screen is large so that it is easily read while you're driving .
The screen is big enough to view maps, street names, etc easily .

I was afraid the screen on one of these things would be too small for me to see, and the last thing I need would be futzing around with a GPS screen when I'm on the road if I wanted to do that, I could drive and read a map !
battery-life_amazon_kindle: Battery life is pretty spot on .
Plus the Kindle 2's Battery life is 4 days longer per charge .
satellite_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: It also finds the satellite quickly .

keyboard_netbook_1005ha: The keyboard, though slightly smaller than standard, is a pleasure to use .

comfort_honda_accord_2008: It is comfortable, easy to drive, and fast !

staff_swissotel_chicago: The staff was very friendly and helpful .

features_windows7: But that aside, I like the availability of software, the new features like the improved Taskbar, Windows Peek, and the Aero environment .

buttons_amazon_kindle: The buttons are placed in a convenient area without being in the way, yet turning a page is a breeze .

service_holiday_inn_london: Service was great and the location of the hotel was very convenient   .

accuracy_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: This is a great GPS, it is so easy to use and it is always accurate .
Accuracy is as good as any other unit, they all sometimes tell you you have arrived when you haven't, or continue to tell you to turn when you're already there .
Depending on what you are using it for, it is a nice adjunct to a travel trip and the directions are accurate and usually the quickest, but not always .
directions_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Directions and maps are easy to use, and if you miss a turn, it updates your route in seconds .
The purpose of the GPS is to give me directions in unfamiliar locations .
Traffic directions are as good and detailed as can be, as you would expect from a Garmin, and less intrusive than on some other brands .
mileage_honda_accord_2008: Gas mileage not quite as good as advertised .
Gas mileage is wonderful, 1st tank 26 mpg with almost all city driving .

eyesight-issues_amazon_kindle: I have an  eye issue  and noticed it was getting harder to read books .

screen_netbook_1005ha: Screen is nice, and adequately sized, , use fullscreen browsing .

navigation_amazon_kindle: Once I got used to it, the navigation was easy too .

price_amazon_kindle: I had been wanting a Kindle but had balked at getting one because of the price, but after our last move and packing up all of our books, and giving many away I was more open to the idea .

quality_toyota_camry_2007: While I love the design, the poor components, sub, par fit, and, finish, poor quality control, and unreliable work on the part of dealership techs will make me question the quality of any future Toyota vehicle .

comfort_toyota_camry_2007: Very comfortable, quite and smooth ride .

performance_honda_accord_2008: The car is great, both with styling and performance .

display_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: Display is excellent ,  the layout of information on the screen is very good showing upcoming turns at the top, your speed, the local speed limit and the estimated time of arrival at the bottom .
I have checked the display in three areas I am familiar with :

parking_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: However, parking is $30 night and valet only, which becomes a pain .
